title: Joy Of Life - Enjoy & Hear The Children (1985-88)
description:
Joy of Life formed in the early 1980's. A mini LP 'Enjoy' was recorded and released on NER (New European Recordings) circa 1984. Joy of Life's second recording an LP entitled 'Hear The Children' was released by the band when a recording deal with a not to be named Italian record label fell through.

Warrior Creed	4:46
Hear The Children	3:57
